all_features_implemented_per_design_spec.notes: All 7 FRs and 4 NFRs implemented. FR-001: QL-012 registered. FR-002: chunk splitter documented. FR-003: parallel spawner documented. FR-004: result merger with dedup. FR-005: Phase 16 fan-out. FR-006: Phase 08 fan-out. FR-007: --no-fan-out flag.

unit_test_coverage_80_percent.notes: 46 tests across 4 files. All 21 P0, 18 P1, 7 P2 test cases from test-cases.md implemented. 100% requirement coverage.

all_tests_passing.notes: 46/46 fan-out tests pass. 1425/1426 full hook suite (1 pre-existing failure in test-gate-blocker-extended.test.cjs unrelated to this work).

code_follows_linting_style.notes: CJS test files follow node:test + node:assert/strict. Markdown follows existing agent file patterns. JSON follows skills-manifest.json conventions.

implementation_matches_design.notes: All modification points from module-design-phase16.md (4.1-4.5), module-design-phase08.md (4.1-4.3), and module-design-config.md implemented exactly.

code_documentation_complete.notes: SKILL.md created with all 3 components. Agent files updated with full protocol sections. isdlc.md flag table updated. implementation-notes.md written.

red_phase.notes: 30 tests failed (manifest, protocol, integration); 16 config tests passed (state read/write)

green_phase.notes: Iteration 1: 45/46 pass (TC-P07 failed - Track B note outside test window). Iteration 2: 46/46 pass (added early Track B reference).

constitutional_compliance.notes: Art I: Implementation matches design specs exactly. Art II: TDD Red (30 failing) -> Green (46 passing) in 2 iterations. Art III: Chunk agents sandboxed read-only. Art V: Protocol-only, no executable code. Art VII: All changes traced to FR/NFR IDs. Art VIII: SKILL.md + agent docs + flag docs updated. Art IX: All gate checklist items pass. Art X: Partial failure -> degraded mode, below-threshold -> single-agent fallback.

summary: GATE-06 PASS: REQ-0017 fan-out/fan-in parallelism implemented. 5 production files modified/created, 46 new tests all passing, 0 regressions. Protocol-only changes (no executable code). TDD Red-Green in 2 iterations.
